mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, content, img, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, STATUS, category_id as categoryId, hits, loves, user_id as userId FROM mk_content limit #{pno},#{psize}
mapper.update: UPDATE mk_content SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, content = #{content}, img = #{img}, update_time = NOW(), `status` = #{status}, category_id = #{categoryId}, hits = #{hits}, loves = #{loves}, user_id = #{userId} WHERE id = #{id}
